detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 1
detailed_analysis.judgment: Flawless grammar. Everything reads clean and natural. Feels a bit detached from the main topic — maybe tie your points back more clearly. Your tone feels warm and confident — it’s pleasant to read. Even-tempered expression — clear without being flat.

detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 2
detailed_analysis.judgment: Slight grammatical bumps — barely noticeable though. Feels a bit detached from the main topic — maybe tie your points back more clearly. Positive tone all around — it draws the reader in naturally. Even-tempered expression — clear without being flat.

speaker_summary.Speaker 1: Grammar is spotless — beautifully written sentences. You sometimes lose sight of the topic; clearer linkage would help.
speaker_summary.Speaker 2: Your grammar is mostly solid, with just tiny slips here and there. Some contributions feel detached from the core theme — try re-anchoring them.
